website_summaries.verdict: The G'zOne Boulder is a beefy, rough-and-tumble cell phone with a rich suite of multimedia features beneath its tough exterior, but we were ultimately disappointed with the call quality.
pros: The G'zOne Boulder is military-certified to withstand the elements, plus it has EV-DO Rev
A, a 1.3-megapixel camera, Push-to-Talk, an electronic compass, and support for V Cast Video, VZ Navigator, and V Cast Music with Rhapsody
cons: Call quality was mediocre at best, with a lot of static and echo
The G'zOne Boulder may be bulky for some people, and the music player interface is a tad clunky

customer_reviews.title: Good phone for the money.
customer_reviews.text: This Casio G'zone Boulder is a good phone. We use this phone on Page Plus. Call quality is excellent and speaker quality is very good. The only problem we had with the phone is the battery that came with it. It was a generic battery. It holds a charge for one day. I had to buy an OEM battery for it. The phone is new as described by the seller OEM Battery Depot. The phone does look new. Only problem is the battery.
customer_reviews.author: Bonham Carter

customer_reviews.title: cell phone purchase
customer_reviews.text: This phone actually looks brand new? It is refurbished. I really like it, the speaker is loud enough for me to hear it well. I work in a loud environment. It fits in my pocket, it is very durable! I received the order very quickly. Ordering was easy. I have no complaints. I would recommend this company to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: cde

customer_reviews.title: very durable
customer_reviews.text: Good phone for the construction field, durable and gets the job done that a PHONE needs to do. Not good for internet, can't send or recieve pictures. and all the buttons are back lit red. Would have liked it better if the send / answer button was green and the quit button was red. It would be much easier to see on the job site
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best phone I ever had
customer_reviews.text: I am too dumb for a smart phone, nor do I need one. I have three of the Boulders, as I collect them for future use. They haven't been made for years. They are virtually indestructable (mine went through the clothes washer and worked as soon as I retrived it). If you want a solid, well made, damage-proof basic cell phone, this is the one.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: GZ One Boulder turns out to be a Pebble!
customer_reviews.text: It was not near as durable as the GZ phone I had previously. Even during the program sequence at the Verizon store, pieces were falling off, literally falling off!. I would snap them back in place but they still fell off. I got home and had to super glue them into place. This happened only 2 hours after getting the phone. The battery charger connection is pretty flimsy too. I sure it will break way too soon. Rather disappointed in the whole package. Thought from the picture I was getting the GZ phone that had durable rubber casing that can hold up to normal use. Did like the price though, but should have remembered, "you get what you pay for"
customer_reviews.author: mike russell

customer_reviews.title: Good phone but not reliable
customer_reviews.text: Received it promptly but have had issues with the phone. It locks up frequently. I have to remove the battery to restart the phone. Keys stop functioning and its dead. After removing the battery, it will work. The charger only worked the first week then fell apart. I like the phone itself but its not reliable for a new phone
customer_reviews.author: Pjs

customer_reviews.title: Durable! Flip-phone, not a smartphone.
customer_reviews.text: It is a durable cell phone. If you want to surf the web and play games, find another phone. If you want to make phone calls, and send/receive text messages, and have very! durable device, then this is the phone for you.
customer_reviews.author: tomfazz

customer_reviews.title: ... phone for my husband because I have been so happy with my refurbished Casio GzOne
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone for my husband because I have been so happy with my refurbished Casio GzOne. We just want a tough phone with a good speaker. I ran over my phone a couple of years ago and everything still works on it.
customer_reviews.author: jh

customer_reviews.title: Boulder
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this phone with high hopes but they are reconditioned. After having two of them that did not work properly I decided to opt for a refund. I will say that the customer service offered was hassle free for the replacement of the first and the return of the second.
customer_reviews.author: jwright

customer_reviews.title: As It should Be.
customer_reviews.text: Bought one from the same company about 6 months ago and it came in very clean. The charger came with it as they said and I just activated it and went to useing it right away. It probably still has more features on it than this old man stops to take time to utilize. My boys phone messed up and he is outdoorsy. I bought this second one for him to handle the weather and roughness. Both of them came with extended life batteries and that keeps me and him going several days between charges. I am very satisfied and pleased. Thank You
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Neeley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best phone ever made. I've had 3, and will buy another when this one dies.
customer_reviews.author: T W

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Battery sucked! Will have to find a new one :(
customer_reviews.author: smann

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Casio G'z Boulder phone my husband has had and he loves it. It is very durable and just perfect for someone who is a little rougher on their phone yet doesn't need all the bells and whistles.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne Francis

customer_reviews.title: Great phone.
customer_reviews.text: Great phone. Very durable and water proof. We have had this phone before and loved it. But, it just couldn't hold up under a DC10 bulldozer
customer_reviews.author: Michelle DuBose

customer_reviews.title: Very durable phone
customer_reviews.text: This phone is a tough little phone. It is great for the person who works out side or in a place where the phone may drop or get wet...... My young adult son requested this phone because his dad has one and it worked like a trooper.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Kay Park

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: used for a week then went back to the smart phone. Thought I could reverse technology, but......
customer_reviews.author: kohn Dwight

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME dumb phone
customer_reviews.text: I bought this basic phone for my wife because I have been very happy with my Casio Gzone Commando (smart phone). It has proven to be very reliable and tough, so I figured this dumb phone casio might be a good bet. So far I have no issues. It's tough, well built, and works very well. Sound quality is decent and since my wife didn't want a smart phone, it does everything she wanted it to do. I'm confident it's going to last.
customer_reviews.author: busch4all

customer_reviews.title: I HATE MY PHONE
customer_reviews.text: This phone did not meet my expectations, my old phone worked so much better and it was easier. Right now, and my phone is only a few months old, will not work properly. It keeps shutting off and sometimes will not let me make a call. Also, I have had to charge it every day for the last four days and it is a new battery.
customer_reviews.author: Patrice K. Paradela

customer_reviews.title: Brand New!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Not a scratch on it, works great, sound is perfect! I absolutely love it! I would definitly recommend this seller if you want this phone!
customer_reviews.author: AKAAKK

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work right sometimes.
customer_reviews.text: I only chose two stars for this phone mainly for the fact that this phone drops calls, it displays the wrong date on the face of the phone, yet the inside would show a different date. I have had the phone randomly shut off on me, and I wouldn't be able to receive picture text messages. I've been disappointed with this phone since I got it a few months ago.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Kerr

customer_reviews.title: Great phone!!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is not a "smart phone" person, he likes a basic phone, which is next to impossible to find in the cell phone stores. This is exactly what he wanted. Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Beth McIntosh

customer_reviews.title: Not a fancy one but it does the job
customer_reviews.text: I needed the phone to work outside in the dust and soil I get a clear voice coming through and it looks sturdy enough if your looking for an affordable outside phone then this is a good start. I first had trouble with the phone not recording missed calls but once I contacted the seller it was quickly taken care of so overall it does the job for work
customer_reviews.author: Myra:)

customer_reviews.title: Good phone
customer_reviews.text: It was a good phone until my wife crushed it... It's not a smartphone but does the job if you're on call.
customer_reviews.author: Hard2Please

customer_reviews.title: product was deliverd as promisdes
customer_reviews.text: product looked to be new as adervertised, and was easly set up. came with chrger and dvd in sealed box and works fine. but only have had a few days and have given to my son to put it through its paces but so far if he cant tear it up i think its a good product.
customer_reviews.author: joel m stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: The phone does not keep a charge, it has to be recharged every night, and this is with limited use. Very disappointed in this phone. Has to be charged more then my I Phone with all of its apps.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Graham

customer_reviews.title: Weak Link
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone for my 13 year old son because he is a boy and is hard on things. He loved the phone for the two weeks that it worked. About two weeks after ordering the phone apparently it stopped charging. He took it to Verizion and was told that the charging port on these phones is the weak link and that it is a common occurence with this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Eakin867

customer_reviews.title: Good for a basic phone
customer_reviews.text: The phone is nice for a basic phone. It seems to be very user friendly, but wish the brightness was brighter. It was really awesome to get a spare battery, but I hope that doesn't hint at what is to come for battery life. This phone was real easy to activate through my verizon.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: broken phone and charger
customer_reviews.text: had to buy a different one from Verizon and don't know how to return! Piece of junk and I want Amazon to know. This was supposed to be new.
customer_reviews.author: chooks

customer_reviews.title: Verizon no longer let customer download apps to older phones
customer_reviews.text: Hi Verizon made an upgrade, this upgrade stops older phone from downloading apps like backup assistant. The only way to get your contacts is by going to a verizon, or blue tooth from your old phone to you new phone.
customer_reviews.author: Ephraim Wiesel

customer_reviews.title: Battery Power does not last
customer_reviews.text: The phone itself is great. But the battery wears down very quickly. If I call someone, the battery starts going dead after about 10 minutes of talk. I need to find a battery that will work with this phone and last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Napoli

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone
customer_reviews.text: This is a very rugged phone and is just what I need on my construction jobs. This is my second phone like this. The last one lasted 6 years and was still working when I retired it. Great phone.
customer_reviews.author: sherman

customer_reviews.title: thumbs down
customer_reviews.text: Charger didn't work and found out that charger port has a short!! I a m not happy with this phone!!
customer_reviews.author: Jana Evans

customer_reviews.title: works grate for work.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to replace the phone I lost at work. I drive a cement mixer, so the water proof has been put the test. I have dropped it few times and it has keep on working. I give this phone 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: paul hynson

customer_reviews.title: 5 star
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a good phone that you don't have to worry about this is it. This phone is tough, water proof and just an all around good phone if you are looking for toughness.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Good Phones
customer_reviews.text: The phones were new as described and in great shape. One of the phone battery will not hold a charge. In the process of returning the battery for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie Walsh

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PHONE
customer_reviews.text: This is the only phone my husband will have. He has tried many others and he always comes back to this one.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Koch

customer_reviews.title: Battery sucks
customer_reviews.text: I love these phones, I've owned three. I traded my son my I phone for his new GZ one because I missed it, but The battery doesn't last a full day with this new phone. Disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Charles W Pickett

customer_reviews.title: Great Rugged Phone
customer_reviews.text: My spouse loves the phone! it's easy hand fitted, not bulky in your pocket and light weight. It has a flashlight, camera he really likes. i would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: great phone!
customer_reviews.text: I use this phone constantly in my small business. This is replacing my old Casio Boulder which was used and abused for a long time - yet still worked. Great durable no-frills phone.
customer_reviews.author: allen much

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy phone
customer_reviews.text: Good basic phone. They are hard on phones since we work in the construction, so I buy this phone for all my guys because it does break easily.
customer_reviews.author: Cloughman

customer_reviews.title: thank you good stuff quik service will huy here again
customer_reviews.text: Exelent top knotch everything i expected great service great product .i love the phone so tough anr every thing i was needing for a clumsy grand mother
customer_reviews.author: charles eaker

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone the speaker is louder so I can hear better then my other phone. my other phone I could not hear over then.
customer_reviews.author: emma kladis

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and durable!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to operate for calls and texting. Sends and receives quality photos. Durable and faultless! I HIGHLY recommend the G'zone Bolder!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy A. Gregg

customer_reviews.title: Casio G'zone
customer_reviews.text: I exchanged 4 of these phones with the seller. Each one had a defect of one sort or another. After the 4th defective phone, now I am told that the product is out of warranty and that there will be no refund. The reason that I ordered the phone in the first place is that it was my boss's most reliable phone. Certainly not the case through this seller - if they are reconditioned or used it is not noted in the product description. Very deceiving and disappointing. Mary
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone!
customer_reviews.text: The phone works great! The only problem is that it cant be used as a pre pay phone. Was told that by verizon. So i had to put it on a plan.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Main Sr

customer_reviews.title: casio phone
customer_reviews.text: the battery that came with the phone does not hold a charge the phone hesitates when ever I select a function
customer_reviews.author: britt curtice

customer_reviews.title: Casio GzOneBoulder cell phone
customer_reviews.text: The phones were both in horrible horrible condition rusty scratched dirty . I didn't waste my time charging them they were in such bad condition
customer_reviews.author: john r jorgensen

customer_reviews.title: If you need a durable phone, works great.
customer_reviews.text: This is 2nd one for husband, he is tough on cell phones. Easy for him to use & can take 99.9% of the abuse.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this phone for my father because he is a construction worker and needs a dependable phone. The phone is great! The price of the phone was very decent and the shipping was free and was shipped faster than normal. He received this phone within the shipping period stated and in the condition stated in the description.Couldn't be happier about this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: king

customer_reviews.title: good flip phone
customer_reviews.text: good for talk not so hot for text .it is what it is a flip phone that will take wet and rough use
customer_reviews.author: Rudie Boulware

customer_reviews.title: casio G'zOne cell phone
customer_reviews.text: Phone works great, but my charger doesn't work with this phone. I had the same phone before that I lost.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Schwantes

customer_reviews.title: awsome phone
customer_reviews.text: i left it in a pair of jeans then washed the jeans and the phone workes great really great phone
customer_reviews.author: hank

customer_reviews.title: Casio phone
customer_reviews.text: I received my order very quickly and was very pleased with the condition of my order. I would recommend INDY for your cell phone needs.
customer_reviews.author: vauclaire

customer_reviews.title: Just what I have been looking for.
customer_reviews.text: This phone has all I want and more. After a number of other phones this one really has everything that suits my needs.
customer_reviews.author: margaret melnick

customer_reviews.title: The plug-in is very difficult to use, and the screen and buttons are smaller than I'd like.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this phone is just ok. The plug-in is difficult to use (I bent it trying to plug it in). And it a little smaller and lighter than the photos appear. But overall, it seems to be an ok phone for the price. I would spend the little extra money on the gzone ravine 2. its a much better phone for a few more dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: will not program
customer_reviews.text: Can not get phone to program with Verizon. Will ring sometimes, most of the time goes directly to voicemail. Stopped in Verizon store and they said it was an internal lock on the phone. Emailed the sender and was told I could return it. I did not buy the phone because I wanted to return it. I bought it to use. Some support as far as how to turn off the internal lock was what I need to know.
customer_reviews.author: eddie

customer_reviews.title: broke easily
customer_reviews.text: This phone was easy to break although it was advertised to be tough. Not pleased with this purchase at all.
customer_reviews.author: wellwithin.wanderings

customer_reviews.title: verizon phone/ perfect condition
customer_reviews.text: Thanks for a great transaction! Phone is in great condition...My husband loves these phones, he works in the elements so they can take abuse!!
customer_reviews.author: Irene Koogler

customer_reviews.title: outdated
customer_reviews.text: We have to take it to a Verizon store to get the updates before we can use it now, whenever.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Friend

customer_reviews.title: great phone
customer_reviews.text: i have had this phone for myself for about 4 years it is indestructible! so i got this one for my 11 year old son he can take it in our pool and it works under water! Great deal on batteries here too
customer_reviews.author: H.E.

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: When I bought this product the phone was listed as "used - like new." Let me say that I have worked in the cellular retail industry and the phone I received was nothing "like new." I would describe it as "used -poor condition," with gouges on the facing, multiple wear points (obviously used by someone for a extended period of time), broken features (including a nonfunctional camera), and a nonstandard battery causing the phone to be unwieldy. In addition the screw used to lock the battery in place is striped from repeated use. Over all I'm very disappointed in the sellers interpretation df the words "like new."
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Hope

customer_reviews.title: Why is the the Boulder lower quality than the Rock?
customer_reviews.text: Not saying I didn't get what I paid for; the phone is serviceable and everything I like in a "dumb" phone. That being said, the Boulder is definitely a step down from the Rock that I owned for 4 years. You can tell that this phone is cheaply made; light weight, has to be charged daily, speaker full of static on high volume, fewer settings, The worst function is that you can't hit snooze on the alarm unless you open the phone! Only owned for a few weeks; hope it holds up, but I have doubts...
customer_reviews.author: Ckirbee

customer_reviews.title: The phone fell apart in a month
customer_reviews.text: Phone was reconditioned to new status (no marks, scratches or wear marks). Came with a wall charger. Was able to find acessories for a good price on the web. Would buy from these folks again. Having said this, the phone lasted about a month and fell apart. Performance wise it started dropping calls (have Verizon), then the battery would hold a charge only daily. Changed out to new battery and same result. Finally the charger pooped out. I gave the phone away to a friend that salvaged the parts. Better luck next time I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Cmorbutts

customer_reviews.title: the battery never worked
customer_reviews.text: ordered this phone and the battery never worked. I had ordered it for my dad, who ended up just buying a new phone through Verizon all together 1 day after receiving this. Had I known that, the phone would have been returned immediately. How can you send a phone that won't charge with a broken battery? My father is elderly and didn't think he could have returned it. Do not buy from this seller
customer_reviews.author: NMP

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on time in great shape
customer_reviews.text: My family is tough on cellular phones. I personally never got a changce to use these, but family members grabbed and activated them when their original (Smart-er phones) were either dunked, lost or smashed. These are rugged phones with few bells and whistles. I expect my two phones are still in use somewhere by someone else who is waiting for their replacement smart phone to arrive.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry

customer_reviews.title: As is
customer_reviews.text: I'm thinking about sending this back. I paid $30 for one other and it's in better condition than this one. It's missing pieces and there is no connection between the battery and the charger because it won't charge in my charging dock. I have to us the plug to charge it. So I haven't connected the service on it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Waunderin Will

customer_reviews.title: Tough phone
customer_reviews.text: I got this phone because I dropped my last one in puddle and promised myself I would get a phone that could handle it. It's a great phone if you don't like frills and are careless with your electronics. The battery life is abysmal and if you want to get more than 45 minutes of talk time, you need to get the extended battery pack.
customer_reviews.author: Kyermemehtar

customer_reviews.title: This phone is tough. It has been washed and ...
customer_reviews.text: This phone is tough. It has been washed and dried, and left in a snowbank for 3 days. I can promise they'll all do this, but ours still works! Obviously has saved us a fortune with a kid who forgets to check pockets.
customer_reviews.author: bagachips

customer_reviews.title: Casio & Amazon-- what a pair!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for son #2 as a replacement for one that he had used for years! He was so grateful to get one just like his old one. No frills-- nothing new to get used to. He is loving it. Thanks to the former owner & Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: LadyThornbird

customer_reviews.title: Great seller!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried when I was looking to buy a replacement flip phone, for my dad, that was sturdy and afforable. This one was like new but was advertized as used. Really! No scrathes, keyboard feels unused! Even smells new! Fast shipping! Great!
customer_reviews.author: D. Woodward

customer_reviews.title: Awesome phone
customer_reviews.text: loved the fast shipping this seller does.. this is my husbands most favorite phone, tough, rugged, he puts phone in pocket with all kinds of stuff.. so he needs a tough phone. economical for this type of phone.. waterproof, shock proof... good durrable rugged phome
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A. Theis

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone.
customer_reviews.text: Great phone to have. Battery stands out a little (not flat) but it keeps a charge well. It doesn't have all the things the new phones have but it works as a phone. Good for people who have more experience and want a simpler phone to use. A phone you can carry and it will still work.
customer_reviews.author: Peggyfw

customer_reviews.title: rugged
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for my son who continually breaks phones either by getting them wet or dropping them. This one has fallen in the pool and immediately was working and has been dropped numerous times with no ill effects.
customer_reviews.author: clare

customer_reviews.title: Wish more were available
customer_reviews.text: This is one sturdy phone! My husband is a contractor and needed a phone that could survive the rigors of the job. It also has a loud ringer adjustment so that he can hear it in noisy environments. Our budget likes the fact that it did not require us to purchase a SIM card and does not require a data plan with our carrier.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: not happy
customer_reviews.text: The phone is what I expected except for the fact that there is no call log. No received, missed, or dialed calls. If I had known that, I wouldn't have bought the phone. It was for my husband, who needs to know who called for his business.
customer_reviews.author: WBrum

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in April. Hardly used, no abuse, never dropped, and it doesn't work 6 months later. Using cell phones since the 90's and never had one malfunction until now.
customer_reviews.author: Khaki

customer_reviews.title: ... and still going strong one yr into my purchase perfect backup phone that never fails
customer_reviews.text: This phone has been through hell and back with me and still going strong one yr into my purchase perfect backup phone that never fails
customer_reviews.author: ark

customer_reviews.title: Nice just nice
customer_reviews.text: Got this phone for my father since he does hard labor and this phone I must say it's built like a tank good product .... thank you
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Anguiano Jr

customer_reviews.title: charger port defective, ruins an otherwise good phone
customer_reviews.text: This phone seemed perfect for my father-in-laws active lifestyle. While it had a charge it worked great, unfortunately the charging cable came apart on first use. Monster Utopia was excellent and sent a replacement charger, unfortunately it also broke upon first(very careful) use because of a manufacturing defect in the charger port in the phone. Fortunately they are taking it back, good service from Monster Utopia. Something slipped through quality control to have such a fundamental problem as a defective charging port. If not for this defect it would be a 4- or 5- star phone.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J. Pickering

customer_reviews.title: Tough phone
customer_reviews.text: Works well, 1st phone was defective, had to get it replaced. But second worked as expected. would buy another..............maybe or not
customer_reviews.author: George Botkin

customer_reviews.title: Buy this phone!
customer_reviews.text: I have had 2 of the orange c711's with the small little speaker on the back and this phone blows them away the speaker quality is amazing on this rugged phone ill never have another
customer_reviews.author: Bradley T

customer_reviews.title: Good simple phone
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was faster then expected and its a great replacement phone. As someone who works in harsh conditions going thru phone after phone, this phone has been holding up very well. Nothing fancy, just a good strong and dependable phone with basic features. I would of liked a better quality camera n better resolution screen is the only reason why it didn't get 5 stars. But then again, this is not what this phone is about. If you want something that will take more abuse then most phones or for any for that matter I ever came across, this is one for you.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Pfeuffer

customer_reviews.title: boulder cell phone
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase. My husband loves this phone. It's a TANK! I would definately recommend this item to anyone to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Ailea333

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Didn't do enough research about this phone. Works well except the echo on the other end when I use hands-free, and I didn't know it doesn't have a usb port as my wife's Casio does. Wish the battery lasted a little longer, but again, I got what I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Robbd258

customer_reviews.title: Love this phone.
customer_reviews.text: My husband has this type of phone and he is hard on the phone and it works very good for us.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa A. Harmon

customer_reviews.title: Casio G
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my dad who doesn't know much about cellphones...... He likes it. the shipping almost beat me home. LOL It was a pleasure working with this company, Thanks and have a blessed successful year.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Casio G'zone Boulder Cell Phone
customer_reviews.text: The seller was correct about everything he promised in the phone. It arrived a day earlier than expected too. Its a great phone, the only draw back with it is the battery does not stay charged for more than 6-8 hrs. But other than that its ok.
customer_reviews.author: sky@gazier

customer_reviews.title: Not as great as we thought
customer_reviews.text: Short battery life and not user friendly. Cannot download ringtones for some reason. It is rugged and good for a guy who is rough on their phone!
customer_reviews.author: Mimiluvs3

customer_reviews.title: Second one
customer_reviews.text: It is very durable.....will last another 2 years...easy to program, just a basic phone for someone that only needs this type
customer_reviews.author: phirko

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice basic phone
customer_reviews.text: Alright so I purchased this phone for my mother in-law who tends to be very rough on her phones. The last one she had disappeared for about a month and when she finally found it it was in the freezer. I thought since she isn't very technology savvy this would be a good phone for her. The phone was shipped and received very quickly and arrived ahead of schedule. The phone works very well, has a good battery life, and good signal. I would recommend this phone to anyone who's looking for a good quality basic phone.
customer_reviews.author: Stewart A.

customer_reviews.title: great phone
customer_reviews.text: the only reason i had to replace this phone after several years is that it would not charge any more. i'm very pleased with this rugged phone
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Works fine, durable, like new, big buttons, great service.... couldn't ask for more. Very nice for my husband who goes through phones monthly. This one is still holding on.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Bell

customer_reviews.title: phone
customer_reviews.text: a great durable phone to handle my life that always has those mishaps and it transfered on my account with no problem
customer_reviews.author: Patrick H

customer_reviews.title: Neat, but battery life is below par.
customer_reviews.text: A vast improvement over the regular phones that Verizon carries, but the battery life is weak. Let me use this opportunity to just jab at Verizon for one moment. I notice that in their effort to push everyone into the expensive smart phone universe, Verizon is carrying only a couple of models of regular phones in their store -- all crappy garbage. This phone is way better than what they carry in their stores and the compass is cool as well.
customer_reviews.author: JKR

customer_reviews.title: very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this phone for my husband because he no longer can read the letters or numbers on his phone. I didn't have any trouble with the ordering process or the time it took to get the phone; but when the phone came the charge port did NOT work. We could not charge the phone with the wall charger or the car charger that I ordered seperately. I am returning this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: great phone
customer_reviews.text: I find casio is a good product, it works well and is very durable. I like something very simple and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Peter J. Ewell

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It broke after two months of use. Do not buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: YEAH!
customer_reviews.text: my phone came when it said it would!! My husband farms and he hasn't broke it yet!!!!!! Thank You! Laura
customer_reviews.author: laura dalton

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this phone
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this phone. Then, one day, what I was pulling out the charger cord, the connector inside the phone came away with it. Turns out the connector inside the phone is only *glued* in. It's a separation waiting to happen. I had to buy a cradle charger to keep the phone charged. And forget about USB connectivity. Apart from the lousy glued-in connector that's guaranteed to fall out, this is an OK phone, I suppose. I wouldn't recommend it, however.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: My brothers old casio Gzone died and he wanted to same kind of phone. This is exactly what he wanted
customer_reviews.author: Bev
